command_group: az network firewall policy rule-collection-group draft
description: Manage and configure Azure firewall policy rule-collection-group draft.

commands.name: az network firewall policy rule-collection-group draft create
commands.summary: Create an Azure firewall policy rule collection group draft.
commands.syntax:
az network firewall policy rule-collection-group draft create --policy-name
                                                              --priority
                                                              --resource-group
                                                              --rule-collection-group-name
                                                              [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]

commands.name: az network firewall policy rule-collection-group draft delete
commands.syntax:
az network firewall policy rule-collection-group draft delete [--ids]
                                                              [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                                              [--policy-name]
                                                              [--resource-group]
                                                              [--rule-collection-group-name]
                                                              [--subscription]
                                                              [--yes]

commands.name: az network firewall policy rule-collection-group draft show
commands.syntax:
az network firewall policy rule-collection-group draft show [--ids]
                                                            [--policy-name]
                                                            [--resource-group]
                                                            [--rule-collection-group-name]
                                                            [--subscription]

commands.name: az network firewall policy rule-collection-group draft update
commands.summary: Update an Azure firewall policy rule collection group.
commands.syntax:
az network firewall policy rule-collection-group draft update [--add]
                                                              [--force-string {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                                              [--ids]
                                                              [--name]
                                                              [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                                              [--policy-name]
                                                              [--priority]
                                                              [--remove]
                                                              [--resource-group]
                                                              [--rule-collection-group-name]
                                                              [--set]
                                                              [--subscription]
                                                              [--tags]
